Class ptx_inter

  • java.lang.Object
    • ptx_inter

  • public class ptx_inter
extends java.lang.Object
    This class is the main one in the PTX library. It helps you setting up the whole system, diagnosing what goes wrong, and display helpful calibrating GUI. It's also the class that returns the list of all color area recognised.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void displayDebugIntel()
      Helper function to display some of the most often needed parametrs value for the Recognise mode.
      void displayFBO()
      Display the Frame Buffer Object where everything is drawn, following the determined keystone.
      void drawArea()
      Helper functions that draws all parsed areas.
      void generalRender()
      Main rendering function, that dispatch to the other renderers.
      java.util.ArrayList<area> getListArea()
      Helper functions to access all the scanned areas.
      void keyPressed()
      Ptx KeyPressed function that highjack most of the keys you could use.
      void loadConfig()
      Load all parametrs from a predifined file (data/config.json)
      void renderCamera()
      Sub renderer function, to display the Camera First mode allows for the whole camera to be displayed, and selection of the 4 corneres of the ROI.
      void renderMire()
      Sub renderer function, to display the Mire
      void renderRecog()
      Sub renderer function, to display the Recognition mode.
      void renderScan()
      Sub renderer function, to display the Scanning white screen when in the process of flashing the drawing
      void saveConfig()
      Save all parametrs in a predifined file (data/config.json)
      void scanCam()
      Get another image from the camera, apply geometric correction and update the subsecant images (while not parsing the picture) A full scan would be scanCam + scanClr
      void scanClr()
      Update the subsecant images of the camera and parse the image (while not asking for a new camera picture before that) A full scan would be scanCam + scanClr

      • Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

        clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

    • Method Detail

      • getListArea

        public java.util.ArrayList<area> getListArea()
        Helper functions to access all the scanned areas.
        Returns:
        ArrayList corresponding to the list of all Areas

      • scanCam

        public void scanCam()
        Get another image from the camera, apply geometric correction and update the subsecant images (while not parsing the picture) A full scan would be scanCam + scanClr

      • scanClr

        public void scanClr()
        Update the subsecant images of the camera and parse the image (while not asking for a new camera picture before that) A full scan would be scanCam + scanClr

      • drawArea

        public void drawArea()
        Helper functions that draws all parsed areas.

      • displayFBO

        public void displayFBO()
        Display the Frame Buffer Object where everything is drawn, following the determined keystone.

      • generalRender

        public void generalRender()
        Main rendering function, that dispatch to the other renderers. Scan, Mire, Camera, Recogintion.

      • renderMire

        public void renderMire()
        Sub renderer function, to display the Mire

      • renderCamera

        public void renderCamera()
        Sub renderer function, to display the Camera First mode allows for the whole camera to be displayed, and selection of the 4 corneres of the ROI. Second allows for just the ROI to be displayed and geometric correction to be tested/applied.

      • renderRecog

        public void renderRecog()
        Sub renderer function, to display the Recognition mode. This mode has a few substate, all to diagnose if the color recognition is working fine, and to fine tune it if it's not.

      • renderScan

        public void renderScan()
        Sub renderer function, to display the Scanning white screen when in the process of flashing the drawing

      • displayDebugIntel

        public void displayDebugIntel()
        Helper function to display some of the most often needed parametrs value for the Recognise mode.

      • saveConfig

        public void saveConfig()
        Save all parametrs in a predifined file (data/config.json)

      • loadConfig

        public void loadConfig()
        Load all parametrs from a predifined file (data/config.json)

      • keyPressed

        public void keyPressed()
        Ptx KeyPressed function that highjack most of the keys you could use. Only triggered when in recognision mode.
